login_logout_process.overview: Comprehensive authentication workflow covering login, logout, and security measures

steps.name: Login Form Submission
steps.description: User submits credentials through login form
steps.validation: Client-side basic validation (email format, non-empty fields)

steps.name: Rate Limiting Check
steps.description: Verify user hasn't exceeded login attempt limits
steps.implementation: Check attempt count per IP and per email

steps.name: Credential Verification
process: Compare submitted password hash with stored hash
Check if account requires email verification

steps.name: Session Creation
steps.description: Create secure session upon successful authentication

implementation.session_id: Generate cryptographically secure random session ID
implementation.session_storage: Store session data server-side with user_id, login_time, ip_address

steps.name: Login Response
steps.description: Return appropriate response based on authentication result

account_lockout.notification: Send email alert to user about lockout

logging.alert_thresholds: Multiple failed attempts from same IP

security_responses.generic_error: Invalid email or password (don't specify which)
security_responses.timing_attacks: Consistent response time regardless of user existence
security_responses.ip_blocking: Temporary IP block after excessive failures

automatic_logout.concurrent_sessions: Allow max 3 active sessions per user

security_logout.action: Invalidate all user sessions across all devices

user_facing_messages.account_locked: Account temporarily locked due to multiple failed attempts
user_facing_messages.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again

system_responses.log_errors: Log all authentication errors with context
system_responses.fallback: Graceful degradation when auth service unavailable
